Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Assembly to pass, A.3899A, and the Governor to sign, S.6225/A.3899A, which would tighten regulations, enhance inspections, and provide training and resources to day care providers and parents to ensure the safety of children in child day care homes, programs, and facilities across New York State
Items.MatterName: Tighten regulations, enhance inspections, and provide training and resources to day care providers and parents to ensure the safety of children in child day care homes, programs, and facilities across New York State (A.3899-A and S.6225/A.3899-A).
